features: 【24/7 Loop Writing Nanny Camera】This WiFi wireless spy camera has hotspots, so it can record without WiFi. This security camera can record 24/7 via USB charging. The mini hidden camera will automatically write HD screen files to SD card and overwrite the oldest SD card file, so it can continue to work after it is full.

【All in One Wireless Camera】Although the camera is quite small, it comes with all the useful features you need for a surveillance camera: 120° wide angle, built-in magnet, playback/snapshot/write down, iOS and Android compatible, live screen, multiple cameras or users.

【Multi-functional Security Camera】Compact design, the mini security camera is easy to be hidden, can be installed at corner without being noticed. The camera can be used as nanny camera/pet camera/door camera, can install a micro SD card max is 32G (not included).

【Night Vision & Motion Detection Alert】1080p HD image and infrared night vision provide crystal clear videos and images. Even if the spy camera is in the dark, it will detect and record any movement and send a push notification to your phone at the same time.

【Protect Your Home & Personal Property】A mini WiFi camera can support multiple users and one app can support multiple cameras simultaneously. Just download the free App on your phone (Android, IOS) and configure it with router WIFI (Only 2.4GHz). Then you can check online screen on the app remotely from anywhere in the world.

productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 189 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini Security Hidden Camera Why choose Obdeprlone? Have you been looking for a miniature camera to put on your dog's or cat's collar? Have you looked for a gift that is practical but doesn't feel cheap? One that can be used to record your daily life as well as help you at work. Have you ever wanted a Nanny Cam that can replace a security camera? It's easy to use and can connect to wifi. Have you ever been in a situation where you are not allowed to record video on your cell phone? Don't worry, Obdeprlone Portable Mini Video Recorder is best for you. Small hidden camera, easy to operate, comes with APP.

Different usage scenarios Effective and timely awareness of hazardous situations Once you have installed the camera in a suitable location in your home and downloaded the app, you can use the motion detection feature. If an object moves in front of the camera, your phone will receive an alert and you will know immediately about the dangerous situation in your home.

Effective and timely awareness of hazardous situations Once you have installed the camera in a suitable location in your home and downloaded the app, you can use the motion detection feature. If an object moves in front of the camera, your phone will receive an alert and you will know immediately about the dangerous situation in your home.

Multi-user & Multi-device Browsing Support One APP can connect multiple devices. Not only that, but multiple users can use it at the same time, which means your family can all connect to the camera at the same time to view the live feed. Hidden Camera with 1080P HD On the APP, you can switch the definition at will, and the definition can be adjusted to a maximum of 1080P.And with a 150-degree wide-angle lens, you can see more of what's happening in the room. Coin Size Dimensions Compact design, coin size hidden camera, your camera is less likely to be found. Also, the bottom of the camera has a magnetic attraction, making it easier for you to go and install it in the corner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute and discreet! Small camera for use indoors/outdoors easy install to phone. Quick setup and position it you will get a clear picture of your desired space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gifts for new parents
reviews.reviewText: I gifted this to one of my friends who just had twins. She loves it. Its wide angle camera, built-in magnet, and night vision/motion detection alert features makes it best. It is small but all the qualities that one needs in security camera. The free app is plus. Both my friends and her husband can now watch their twins from their phone even if they aren’t around their babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Surprise, hidden fees!
reviews.reviewText: Be careful! When we went to install this product on the phone, there was a surprise charge of $39.99 to our credit card, and another $2.44 unknown charge. We did not authorize either of these charges and chose to send the camera back without ever getting a chance to test it.
